articles.title: Indian-American Sikh Police Officer Sandeep Dhaliwal's Murderer Sentenced To Death - NDTV
articles.description: Robert Solis, the man convicted of murdering Sandeep Dhaliwal, the first turbaned Indian-American Sikh police officer in the US state of Texas while making a traffic stop in 2019, has been sentenced to death, according to a police official.
articles.content:
Sandeep Dhaliwal made national headlines when he was allowed to wear a turban on the job.
